address.title: Controller Address and ID
address.description: It's important that the controller is always reachable under this network address, otherwise the app will break. Either configure your router to always assign the same IP to this device over DHCP, or configure the controller to use a fixed IP instead of using DHCP. The ID is printed on the controller or can be found in the NGBS app settings.

errors.ENOTFOUND: IP or domain does not exist.
errors.ECONNREFUSED: Connection was refused - maybe not an iCON controller?
